original_text: So the soldiers cut the ropes that held the small boat to the ship. The small boat fell into the water and the wind blew it away.
korean_text: 이에 군인들이 거룻줄을 끊어 떼어 버리니라

sentences.original_text: So the soldiers cut the ropes
that held the small boat to the ship
The small boat fell into the water
and the wind blew it away
